RunMate

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: 2024-08-23

At RunMate, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our app.

Data Collection and Storage

  • No Data Collection: We do not collect, store, or process any personal or usage data on external servers.
  • Local Storage Only: All your activity data, including your goals, performance, and progress, is stored securely on your device. We do not transmit this data to any external services or servers.
  • Your Data, Your Control: Since all data is stored locally on your device, you have complete control over it. RunMate does not have access to, nor do we collect, any of your information.

Security

We take your privacy seriously, and since no data is transmitted or stored externally, your information remains private and secure on your device.

Changes to the Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the "Last Updated" date at the top of this document.

If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, feel free to contact us.
